column1: '''Cwén''' was the name of the first wife of [[Eriol]]. She had two sons, named [[wikipedia:Hengist and Horsa
column3: Horsa]]. After her death, Eriol, then named Ottor, set sail and left his young children who would later become great chieftains of their people.<ref>{{LT1
